definition: A numerical value obtained by adding two or more numbers together. It is commonly used to represent the total or the result of an arithmetic operation.

examples.english: The sum of the numbers is 10.

examples.german: Die Summe aller Teile ergibt das Ganze.
examples.english: The sum of all parts equals the whole.

examples.german: Die Summe der Rechnung betr√§gt 50 Euro.
examples.english: The sum of the bill is 50 euros.

examples.german: Die Summe der Anwesenden ist 20 Personen.
examples.english: The sum of the attendees is 20 people.

examples.german: Die Summe der Bestellungen wurde korrekt berechnet.
examples.english: The sum of the orders was calculated correctly.
